language.name: xtokenize
language.title: XML Tokenize
language.description: Tokenize XML payloads using the specified path expression.
language.label: language,core,xml

headerName.description: Name of header to tokenize instead of using the message body.

mode.description: The extraction mode. The available extraction modes are: i - injecting the contextual namespace bindings into the extracted token (default) w - wrapping the extracted token in its ancestor context u - unwrapping the extracted token to its child content t - extracting the text content of the specified element

trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

id.description: Sets the id of this node
